content.prompt: As the poem progresses, the speaker’s opening question about the news of a death (line 1) unfolds to reveal

choices.label: deep grief and an intimate friendship
curiosity about the dead man’s trade
wonder that defiance of death has ended
unhappy memories of the farrier’s youth

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
